wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant Clement Graham Boothroyd  became an ace during the First World War. He flew as an observer/gunner in a Bristol F.2 Fighter, and in conjunction with his pilots, was credited with 12 confirmed aerial victories.

response: * Clement G. Boothroyd, World War I flying ace
